title: New Darius Splash Art
body:
What's everyone's thoughts on the updated splash art for darius? I personally like it, the details are awesome. Even though there are other champions with much older splash arts that need to be updated I still think it was a good decision. Plus, the swain artwork ;)
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/04/412-pbe-update.html

replies.body:
Absolutely awesome honestly, the older one didn't seem as manly as the new one haha.


(although have you seen the new evelynn one omg)
His chin seems to have gotten a buff.
